nice
很棒的一款游戏哦。

I’ve been playing DBD for about 4 years now, on and off. It’s one of those games which I really like and has some fun gameplay, but there are issues which you’re going to have to ignore if you want to really get into it. To be fair to the developers, there’s not much they can do about the worst of these issues, but more on that later.
The ‘story’ of the game is simple. There’s an interplanar thing called The Entity which feeds off hope which drags beings into its world (known as The Fog) in order to harvest their hope. Survivors are offered hope in the form of being able to escape, yet every time they manage to outrun the killer, they end up at the same campfire, before being forced into the next trial. You can play either survivor or killer, the hunted or the hunter. As a survivor, your objective is to work with the other three people on your team to complete generators and then power the exit gates, which allows you to escape the trial. As a killer, you want to kill all the survivors. You get points for actions you perform in the trial, typically somewhere between 10-20k, and this score translates directly into bloodpoints, the de-facto currency of the game. You can use these points to upgrade your survivors and killers by buying different perks (which last forever), offerings (which last one match), and items (which last until you lose them, usually by dying).
First off, the game is really grindy. Really. Grindy. Each character comes with perks, usually focused on a theme. Take Claudette, who is meant to be a healer, but usually just sits in bushes: you a perk which allows you to heal yourself instead of relying on teammates, a perk which makes your healing faster, and another which allows you to see injured teammates. When you hit level 40, you unlock these perks for other survivors. In order to hit level 40 it’s going to take a little over million bloodpoints, probably a million and a quarter. Considering that you get about 20k bloodpoints per game… yeah. It takes a while. You get point modifiers which modify points in a specific category, or points in general, but it takes a while. The way the level up mechanic works, while interesting, can also make this number a bit bigger. Way back when, the double point modifier was relatively easy to obtain, but they increased the rarity of it to make it harder to get, so you can’t rely on them as much anymore. 
Second off, the game is a bit of a mouse-click simulator. This is easily the biggest flaw of the game, and one which desperately needs a look at. Let’s compare killer and survivor: as a killer, you run around the map, see a survivor, hit them twice, and then they go down. Once they’re down, you can hook them on randomly spawned hooks around the map, and then they die if they’re hooked for too long or too many times. Assuming that you like it, it’s fun, engaging, and there’s a variety of powers and abilities which modify how this works, although some killers are notably worse than others (Clown). Now survivors. When playing a survivor, your main objective is generators. To complete a generator, you sit next to it, hold the mouse button for 80 seconds, and hit spacebar every now and then. For 80 seconds. This is not fun. This is not engaging. There is no variety of powers and abilities which modify how this works. The fun from playing survivor stems from the killer being around, when you’re forced to hide behind corners, or have to run away from them by vaulting over windows and throwing pallets down on them. It is not fun to repair generators. A lot of ideas have been suggested, and it wouldn’t take an amazing one to improve the experience. 
There’s also the issue of balancing. Not between killers and survivors per-se (although some killers and survivors and notably better than others), but between perks. There are about 100 perks for each side, and yet it feels that there’s only 20 which I see in most games. I feel like the developers should hold off on content for a cycle and instead just do a pass on the perks and mechanics within the game.
And the last issue, and definitely the most egregious one, is toxicity. This game is incredibly toxic, and it’s not even something confined to the upper brackets of play. The amount of negative comments I’ve got on my profile from this game alone is pretty whack, and the things which people feel are worthy of a comment are equally bizarre. If you use a certain killer, you’ll be deemed trash, stupid, and should uninstall. If you use a certain perk then you’ll be deemed trash, stupid, and should uninstall. If you don’t prioritise saving that one guy on your team who has more X’s in his name then other letters, you’ll be deemed trash, stupid, and should uninstall. I’ve had people get onto me in the post-game chat for doing something they didn’t like, even though we all escaped and were fine. A lot of the toxicity usually comes from the survivors, who’ll play in a toxic manner, yet hate it when any of this toxicity is reflected on them. I had a game where a survivor was T-bagging me the whole game, and he decided to go for one last T-bag at the exit of the map. I downed him and killed him because you shouldn’t T-bag if you can’t actually play the game, and then I got an essay about how I should have let him go because he ‘earned’ it, and that I was a bad killer anyway, and I’m (you guessed it) trash, stupid, and should uninstall.
All that being said, the game is fun. Provided you can put up with the toxicity then I recommend it, although you might want to bring a friend along as well: nothing is funnier than when you hear your mate scream down his microphone as some pig-headed thing sprints out a bush as him. I realise I’ve just listed the games flaws for 1000 words, but the core loop of the game is pretty good and leads to some suspenseful moments, although I’d be reticent to call them horror.

I can only advise everyone to get it on sale or to just not buy it.
This game was not created to bring fun, it was created to milk you of your money.

Like 40% of the cosmetics are only available for real money, the 60% which are for free are extremely hard to get and share the same currency which allows you to unlock perks without buying all their released (bad) DLCs which are fundamental to win in this game.

80% of the game is behind a pay/grind wall.
This would be ok, if the game was fun to play, but unfortunately it's not.
It encourages bad manners, unsportsmanlike play and is extremely unbalanced.

Usually survivors are favoured, regarding balancing, but they have done some incredibly stupid design decisions regarding survivors also, so I would say, they balance for money gain.

Since 2016 onwards, the devs did never actually communicate properly with the player base.
They rather silence people via banning them off their forums or steam discussions, if they criticize the game too much.

Also the main developers are streaming rarely and play like actual rank 20 garbage.

Just don't buy it, you will get angry over this and will regret your choice of buying this for a 100%.
Like I did.

Solid 2,000 hours, I catch myself so often starting this game, just to leave before the game even starts, because it just brings up bad memories.
Playing this game feels like actual molestation.
If it is getting t-bagged at the exit gates, clicky flashlights, the endgame chat or getting camped, tunneled or left to bleed on the ground for atleast 3 minutes.

Oh btw, if you live in europe, you will get matched up with russians 80% of the time.
They absolutely have no manners in most of the case and are trying way too hard to win, knowing no limits.
I don't play this unbalanced shit to win or rub my victory in the faces of others, I just wanna have fun, but this is fucking impossible with this hot pile of garbage.
So please reader, don't support this.

And if you wanna support it, buy a key, so this greedy ass company doesn't get a dime.

Steam asked me to update this review after 162 hours of more games.
I still strongly disapprove of this game.
Kill it with fire.

I had this game refunded.
We were two guys trying to play and entered a lobby.
After a while two other players joined.
We won automatically because there was no killer.
Then we tried the rest of the time to find another group. ANY other group of people that would join us.
We even changed the region to other countries.
In 66 minutes we couldnt get a single proper game going.
I refunded it.
Not worth it, even if heavily discounted.

在这款游戏上市整整一年之际我终于等来了五折的价格。很久以前在国内某平台上玩过很久，其实这就是一个躲猫猫的益智游戏，几乎不需要操作技巧，需要的是两个字：套路。我一直都最喜欢玩夹子鬼，每个摆夹子的地方都要尽可能有创意，让对面都意想不到，这样才往往会有奇效。

你要问我怎么玩好鬼，我会告诉你：多玩玩人类；
你要问我怎么玩好人类，那就是多玩玩鬼。

另外，该游戏貌似对鬼的网络要求比较高，否则延迟很影响游戏体验。

If I am to give my honest opinion on this game, I would say it's great. The kids who complain about "campers" I see are quite ignorant. Do you post the same review on a game like Call of Duty? Or perhaps you just want to hate on a game because you got that one unlucky game. Oh boo hoo. Get over it.

Aside from the people who complain about camping, I want to also adress the people complaining about the "removed" DLC items. Yes, they were removed... but that was within reason. "I only downloaded this head pack for the hoodie I saw." Well... if you haven't noticed... it says "Head." You know... for head customization? Or does head mean body or leg in your world? Yes, I am giving you this attitude because your reviews actually make me angry. However... yes, they should not have released things and then removed them. But they told us why. It is for a later DLC.

Anyway, I love this game because a 4 vs 1 killer scenario is a game I have been waiting for, for a while. It was done quite well, the way I see it. There are a few bugs, I will agree. They need to be fixed. But besides that, the game is amazing. The only other game I can say is done like this and done well is Friday The 13th, the game. I highly recommend both of these games.

Thanks for taking your time to read this review. I hope it helped you make the decision to buy this game or not.

The game has an extremely toxic, tryhard, and entitled community perpetuated by the largely incompetent decisions of the developers. The game is very biased toward survivors, and the gameplay loop boils down to survivors rushing the objective down in two minutes while the killer is only able to do anything about it if the survivor makes a mistake. The survivor "meta" is extremely stale and revolves around abusing a variety of second chance perks which give survivors multiple get out of jail free cards. Should you manage to overcome these obstacles and thrive as a killer in this game, you will be abused and called a sweaty loser by the four people who managed to screw up so badly that they threw such a massive advantage. Avoid this game if you want to keep your blood pressure down.

很好的游戏，但，前提是，有人带着你一起玩，不然纯新手，对于没有任何教程关卡的情况会一脸懵逼，我就是如此，玩了一个小时仍然不知道技能和道具怎么用。。。。
总体来说我的游戏体验过程如下：
哇哇，好激动，恐怖对战游戏最喜欢了呢！
咦？怎么队友手里有手电我却没有？
这发电机是要修理吗？
好！放着我来！
挖槽？怎么电机还会爆炸？ ∑( ° △ °|||)︴
不好了！杀手来了！快跑！
看到队友用手电晃杀手的眼睛~偶买噶原来杀手除了不能翻窗和跨越障碍，也怕光啊~！
好！我去已经修好的发电机那里！那里光源最亮！≧◇≦
结果。。。。。
嗳暧暧？你不是怕光吗？！你别过来！啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊 ∑( ° △ °|||)︴！！！！
最后惨遭挂树被秒杀。。。。
第二局——
我终于当了一次杀手~我要杀4个~哇哈哈哈哈~
结果：
卧槽泥马你们怎么跑那么灵活！追追追不上啊喂！（╯｀□′）╯┴—┴
卧槽不是吧？他们都修好发电机拉电闸了？ ∑( ° △ °|||)︴
卧槽门开了！快去门口当门神堵截！来一个我杀一个！来一对我杀一双！嘿嘿嘿~
结果可怜的小杀手在门口真的只是门神而已。。。。。。。一个也没杀到。。。。。TnT

——————
卧槽泥马劳资不玩了！！（╯｀□′）╯┴—┴

很多人說對新手難，其實我覺得20把就能上手了,规则简单 4个基佬,5个发电机开启 拉闸开门跑,屠夫就撸人,一直玩的护士屠夫现在20级了,有被溜成狗,也拿过2次4杀,游戏人数一般,10分钟内能开一把,感觉玩了人应该很刺激吧哈哈,可惜没有基友了哈哈只能一直屠夫了.偶尔有人拔网线中断游戏,但是大多数玩家还是很给力的,输了也不会乱退,好游戏值得入.有中文,良心.

----------------------------------------------分割綫--------------------------------------------
二次評論 ，转变到人类角色觉得匹配系统实在不公平,20级的一个技能的新手,匹配全是4个紫色技能的屠夫,分分钟一刀流 ,太难了啊啊啊,老手不愿意带萌新

-----------------------------------------------2019.11------------------------------------------
三次评论，脱离500小时萌新阶段。人类终于爬到红段的屁股了，屠夫也可以吃着高配爬上紫段的屁股。今年的杀鸡依旧良心，精致的魔王DLC，血网的改版，万圣节活动，官方服务器，3周年活动，我觉得制作组很上进呢，虽然平衡的确还差了不少，但是毕竟角色技能多了，真的比较难做平衡，尽量理解吧。

作为爱好和平的双边玩家，我觉得本身就是个非对称游戏，没事就别做柠檬精了。人类别总是说屠夫高配太BUG, 屠夫也别太针对守尸高配人皇。这个版本屠夫上分本身就挺困难的，不能总要求别人屠夫不许带顶级配件然后自己4人语音车队还紫手电+速修箱，这种太圣母了建议还是别玩。其实当成非对称的恐怖游戏玩，根本不存在这些什么碾压不公平问题，游戏而已，开心就好，心态良好，嘴上积德，别老让自己失去双亲。

就游戏本身来说很一般，
四人躲屠夫或者屠夫追四人这种游戏极致并不是很耐玩。
胜在这个游戏并不怎么上瘾，但和好友开黑才是正确的打开方式。
不过不得不吐槽这个游戏的匹配机制，可能因为人少，对新人极不友好，刚开始的时候很有可能就会匹配到老玩家（1000h+那种）
运气好遇到高等级的队友你还没跑地图一圈门就开了，运气不好，刚出来就再屠夫面前，不一会就被吊死。
以我个人经历来说，经常自己人物才可怜的一个技能，20竞技等级，往往能匹配到四技能点满的队友和屠夫。二我玩屠夫的时候，才放下两个架子就被修了四个发电机，好不容易见着一个人就被各种地形卡位秀，最后四人都跑了，完败。结束一看，我屠夫才点了一个技能（先不说这技能还是黄色），20竞技等级，而对手全是四技能点满，13左右的竞技等级。
这匹配机制的坑，在玩屠夫时最为明显。
最后，因为可以开黑，并且支持中文，还可以直连，又不怎么上瘾，不需要可以花功夫积累优势，升级较快，而且不会有产生很大的功利心，所以推荐这款游戏。
另外，除了凤敏其他好丑，信哥贼强。

Selamlar bu incelememi kaç kişi görür okur bilemem ama 100 saat ten fazla oynamış birisi olarak bu oyunu yeterince deneyimlediğimi düşünüyorum. Oyunun artı ve eksi yönlerini sıralıyacağım friday mi dbd mi sorusuna belki yanıt bulabilirsiniz ama bana kalırsa bence gayet açık herneyse incelemeye geçelim

Olumlu yönleri
+Takım oyunu olması
+Mükemmel olmasada güzel grafikler
+sürükleyici oyun tarzı
+Perk ve karakter çeşitliliği
+p2w olmaması

Olumsuz yönleri
-Camper killerların olması (Başınızda bekleyen)
-Az da olsa bazı hilelerin mevcut olması
-Her uptade de survivorların daha da boktanlaşması (genede güzel)
-Bu kadar kitleye sahipken hala biraz daha bugların olması 
İncelemem bu kadar bu oyun bence %100 alınır olumsuz yanları bunlardır ama sizi pek de etkilemez o yüzden rahat olun mutlaka alın ve oynayın friday den çok daha iyidir.

很良心的游戏，当时是因为看到主播玩觉得这个僵尸题材的游戏很新颖，不同于一般僵尸类游戏那种割草杀僵尸，而是将人类变成了被追杀的一方，对于屠夫的限制也很到位，重要的是画质和特效做的都很好！！不像某讯的游戏不充钱就不能变强，一开始可能难上手，但会玩了之后非常好玩，推荐大家来玩！！
很久之前看喜欢的UP主玩过，这次打折就跟朋友一起入了。虽然说到现在就玩了几个小时但是这个游戏的氛围蛮棒的。遇到一个杨教授在我队友死完了之后让我修发电机还把我扛到逃跑的那个地方。第一次逃脱啊！！！我要在这表白他！！！！

I have 47 hours invested in this game so far and I've only had it for a couple of weeks. It's a bit glitchy every now and then, but I absolutely love the concept and it is a blast to play with friends!

*** Re-review: 
Well, apparently tomorrow already marks a year since I reviewed DBD and I now realize that 47 hours is practically no time at all when it comes to this game. I was also a noob at the time... xD
That being said, now that I have a decent amount of playtime racked up, allow me to expand on my previous Dead by Daylight review.

I just broke 1,400 hours and I still love this game just as much as I did a year ago, probably even more. I play it on a nightly basis for hours on end. I've had some real adrenaline rush moments, and I love the thrill of it. 
It seems the devs are finally starting to get their act together. Slowly... Very slowly. But I do see progress happening. I have hope for this game yet, and I can't wait to see what the future holds. 
I also love that they've recently added a store to buy cosmetics. Yeah, they're a bit pricey, but that's if you want to buy the cosmetics that require auric cells. Most of the cosmetics can be bought with iridescent shards, which can be earned through playtime. Despite what people say, it's really not that bad. People are just salty. The devs have to make money to improve their game somehow. I personally don't have an issue with it.

I play both killer and survivor, and surprisingly, I actually enjoy both sides. It does still have it's frustrating moments, but you can't deny that this game is addictive. One thing I do hate is how toxic this community can get.. But you'll see that in almost any game, not just this one. I tend to just ignore the toxicity anyway. It is just a game after all, I'm just here to have fun.

I highly recommend at least giving the game a chance. A real, decent chance. I'm talking at least 500+ hours. Because there is a lot to learn. I also have a lot of patience, which IS required for this game! 
Hard truth: You're not going to be good at this game when you first start out, I'm gonna tell you that right now. You WILL get destroyed at first, and you WILL get matched up with people that are WAY out of your league.
If you get frustrated easily, and aren't willing to take the time to learn, and practice, and understand that you're NOT ALWAYS GOING TO WIN, then this game probably won't be for you. 
Both killers AND survivors do toxic things in game, just take the loss and move on to the next game, better luck next time. It's all you can do. 
Try not to let someone's playstyle discourage you. It sucks, yes, but you can't control the way some people play. Just move on. 

As a side note, Michael Myers is easily my favorite killer, both to play as and to play against. He's just a ton of fun to me, and I love the jumpscares that can be pulled off with him :)
